Package it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.control.transactions

Class TransactionsRefresher

java.lang.Object
it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.control.transactions.TransactionsRefresher
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITransactionsRefresher<MovementRow>
public final class TransactionsRefresher extends Object implements ITransactionsRefresher<MovementRow>
Loads transactions from the service and maps them to MovementRows.

Uses LocalDate.now() as the reference date when mapping, and applies the provided FilterMode (defaults to FilterMode.ALL).

  • Method Details

    • load

      public List<MovementRow> load(FilterMode mode)
      Loads transactions with the specified filter and maps them to rows.

      If mode is null, FilterMode.ALL is used.

      Specified by:
      load in interface ITransactionsRefresher<MovementRow>
      Parameters:
      mode - the filter mode to apply
      Returns:
      a list of MovementRow ready for display
